00044 void EngineSubject::stateChangedNotify( EngineBase::EngineState state )
00045 {
00046     QPtrListIterator<EngineObserver> it( Observers );
00047     EngineObserver *observer;
00048     while( ( observer = it.current() ) != 0 )
00049     {
00050         ++it;
00051         observer->engineStateChanged( state );
00052     }
00053 }
00054

00056 void EngineSubject::newMetaDataNotify( const MetaBundle &bundle, bool trackChanged )
00057 {
00058     QPtrListIterator<EngineObserver> it( Observers );
00059     EngineObserver *observer;
00060     while( ( observer = it.current() ) != 0 )
00061     {
00062         ++it;
00063         observer->engineNewMetaData( bundle, trackChanged );
00064     }
00065 }

00091 
00092 void EngineSubject::attach( EngineObserver *observer )
00093 {
00094     if( !observer || Observers.find( observer ) != -1 )
00095         return;
00096     Observers.append( observer );
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 void EngineSubject::detach( EngineObserver *observer )
00101 {
00102     if( Observers.find( observer ) != -1 ) Observers.remove();
00103 }
